name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine

# Changelog

## 2.203.12
- Refactor package installer menu item and enhance asset upload retry mechanism

Updated on November 06, 2025

## 2.203.11
- Fix null handling in DataProvider.GetSkeletonPoseData() replacement

Updated on November 06, 2025

## 2.203.10
- Fix file path checks for OVR data source candidates

Updated on November 06, 2025

## 2.203.9
- Add null-conditional guard for DataProvider.GetSkeletonPoseData() to prevent NRE

Updated on November 06, 2025

## 2.203.8
- Add MV_META_INTERACTION define for interaction SDK integration

Updated on November 05, 2025

## 2.203.7
- Remove headset pose validation for Android in MetaSpace initialization

Updated on November 05, 2025

## 2.203.6
- Add FixPointableCanvasRegisterTryCatch to handle NullReferenceExceptions in PointableCanvasModule

Updated on November 05, 2025

## 2.203.5
- Add metadata file for FixFromOVRHandDataSourceUpdateDataPoses

Updated on November 05, 2025

## 2.203.4
- Add try/catch wrapper around UpdateDataPoses in FromOVRHandDataSource to prevent app crashes

Updated on November 05, 2025

## 2.203.3
- Update MetaSpace.cs to restrict headset pose validation to Android builds only

Updated on November 05, 2025
